title: The Smile of God
itunes:title: The Smile of God
description:
We all have people that have done us wrong. It’s easy to hold on to the hurt, be vindictive, and try to pay people back. But one test we all have to pass is being good to those that have not been good to us. When you sow seeds of kindness and forgiveness, you’re proving to God that He can trust your character. Get ready for Him to release more favor in your life.Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love. To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
